tool_description: Monitors storage space usage across configured backup storage locations and provides capacity planning insights.

storage_ids.description: List of storage configuration IDs to monitor

warning_threshold_percent.description: Storage usage percentage to trigger warnings (50-95)

critical_threshold_percent.description: Storage usage percentage to trigger critical alerts (60-98)

error_messages: Storage not found: One or more specified storage IDs do not exist.
Storage access denied: Cannot access storage location to check space usage.
Invalid threshold values: Warning threshold must be less than critical threshold, both must be between 50-98.
Monitoring timeout: Storage space check took too long to complete.
usage: Provide list of storage IDs to monitor and optionally set warning and critical thresholds. Returns current usage statistics and alerts for all monitored storage locations.

overall_usage_percent.description: Average usage percentage across all monitored locations

storage_usage.description: Usage details for each monitored storage location

alerts.description: List of storage space alerts and warnings

capacity_projection_days.description: Estimated days until storage capacity is reached based on current usage trends
